name: Stream publishers
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_publishers * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)

name: Stream messages received / s
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_received_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)

name: Stream messages confirmed to publishers / s
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_confirmed_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)

name: Stream consumers
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_consumers * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)

name: Stream messages delivered / s
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)

name: Errors since boot
queries:
sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_access_refused_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_authentication_failure_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_frame_too_large_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_internal_error_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_precondition_failed_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_publisher_does_not_exist_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_sasl_authentication_failure_loopback_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_sasl_challenge_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_sasl_error_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_sasl_mechanism_not_supported_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_stream_already_exists_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_stream_does_not_exist_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_stream_not_available_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_subscription_id_already_exists_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_subscription_id_does_not_exist_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_unknown_frame_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info) +

sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_vhost_access_failure_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)
sort_desc(sum by(rabbitmq_node) (rabbitmq_global_publishers * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info))
sort_desc(sum by(rabbitmq_node) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_received_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info))
sort_desc(sum by(rabbitmq_node) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_confirmed_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info))
sort_desc(sum by(rabbitmq_node) (rabbitmq_global_consumers * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info))
sort_desc(sum by(rabbitmq_node) (irate(rabbitmq_global_messages_delivered_total[60s]) * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info))

name: Errors since boot
queries: sum by(rabbitmq_cluster) (rabbitmq_global_stream_error_access_refused_total * on(instance, job) group_left(rabbitmq_cluster, rabbitmq_node) rabbitmq_identity_info)
